loclizedContent.En: It is probably the mysterious girlfriend of the prickly-headed guy, but no one knows who she is...
loclizedContent.Cn: 很可能是刺刺头的神秘女友,不过他没有告诉任何人女友到底是谁……

loclizedContent.En: You know it too well... Could it be that the person chatting with me now is the alien himself...
loclizedContent.Cn: 你了解得太清楚了……现在跟我聊天的不会就是外星人本人吧……

loclizedContent.En: Automatic reply: Hello, I am away due to something, I will contact you tomorrow.
loclizedContent.Cn: 自动回复:你好,我有事不在,明天再和你联系.

loclizedContent.En: Haha, I was just kidding you, you took it seriously?
loclizedContent.Cn: 哈哈,我跟你开玩笑的,你居然当真啦?
